name: Word Flowers
summary:
Exercise your brain and with thousands of challenging word puzzles, set in a relaxing botanical garden of gorgeous puzzle backgrounds. Test your word smarts, unlock new levels and climb the vocabulary ladder. Word Flowers puzzles start off simple, but progressively become more challenging — unlock new levels with ever-more challenging puzzles! How many puzzles can you solve?

► Enjoy relaxing fun as you explore an arboretum of beautiful puzzles.
► Even without a time limit, these word unscramble puzzles are challenging.
► If you find yourself stuck, use letter hints and the word shuffle to guide your way!

Word Flowers is the latest new word game from PeopleFun, the makers of Wordscapes, Wordscapes Uncrossed, Word Chums, Spell Blitz and MixTwo — played and loved by millions of people around the world.
